Description:
Is AI making it harder for new frameworks to gain traction? Idan Gazit discusses the "consolidation effect," where AI models excel at already popular frameworks like React, reinforcing their dominance. However, he also notes how tools like GitHub Copilot lower the barrier to entry for difficult languages like Haskell.

#React #AI #Haskell

Title: Will AI make react popular forever?
Author: GitHub
